text: Mister Mind is a fictional supervillain appearing in American comic books published by DC Comics. The character was created by Otto Binder and C. C. Beck originally for publication by Fawcett Comics, first appearing in Captain Marvel Adventures #26. (1943). He is a enemy of Captain Marvel (also known as Shazam) and is the leader of the Monster Society of Evil, an appropriately named organization that fights the Marvel Family. == Publication history == Created by Otto Binder and C. C. Beck originally for publication by Fawcett Comics, the character first appeared in Captain Marvel Adventures #26. (1943). == Fictional character biography == He is an evil telepathic space-worm from the planet Venus who had plans to invade and take over the Earth, which they claim to have once ruled around the Ice Age. == Powers and abilities == His incredible mental powers allow him to mind control his victims, taking advantage of and replacing anyone he needs to impersonate. Despite his diminutive appearance, he is an extremely formidable opponent and has gone through several monstrous transformations over the years. == In other media == Mister Mind appears in the DC Extended Universe movies Shazam! (2019) and Shazam! Fury of the Gods (2023), portrayed in CGI and voiced by director David F. Sandberg. Category:Fawcett Comics Category:DC Comics supervillains
